Big5: Personality questionnaire based on the Big Five model.

descriptionFull:
This application provides informational and emotional support using <bold>artificial intelligence</bold>.

‚ö†Ô∏è <bold>IMPORTANT: This application does NOT provide therapeutic or psychotherapeutic services.</bold>
‚Ä¢ This is <bold>NOT therapy, NOT psychotherapy, and NOT medical care</bold>.
‚Ä¢ We provide only <italic>informational support and self-help tools</italic>.
‚Ä¢ AI <bold>cannot replace a licensed mental health professional</bold>.
‚Ä¢ <italic>Questionnaire results are for informational purposes only</italic> and are not a diagnosis.
‚Ä¢ <bold>For professional help, consult a licensed therapist, psychologist, or psychiatrist.</bold>

üìû <bold>In crisis situations:</bold>
Immediately contact emergency services, a doctor, or your local crisis hotline.

üîê <bold>Privacy:</bold>
We <italic>do not collect or store personal data</italic>.
All information is stored <bold>exclusively on your device</bold>.
youAreTalkingToAI: You are talking to an AI assistant
startWithSan: Let's first assess your current emotional state.
showCompleted: Session completed. What would you like to do next?
welcomeMessage:
Welcome to the emotional support and self-help application.
Please complete registration to begin.
Youneed: After listening, you will be able to:
Rate: Rate using the L√ºscher color test or parametric mood scales. Takes 1 minute, and assessment will be completed.
Testinstructionslusher: Make yourself comfortable. After clicking on the image above (Start test), you will be presented with eight cards of different colors. First, select the card of the color that is most pleasant to you right now. Please do not associate the card color with the color of your clothing, car, etc. After your choice, this card will disappear, and you will repeat the action until all cards are selected. Then you will be automatically redirected to the next page.
Testinstructionssan: Make yourself comfortable. After clicking the button above, you will be asked to describe your current state using a table consisting of polar characteristics. You should choose the characteristic in each pair that best describes your state and mark a place on the scale corresponding to the intensity (strength) of this characteristic.
Overthelast2weeks: Rate how often you have experienced the following feelings over the last 2 weeks
Gad1: Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge.
Gad2: Not being able to stop or control worrying.
Gad3: Worrying too much about different things (e.g., work, finances, health).
Gad5: Being so restless that it's hard to sit still.
Gad7: Feeling afraid as if something awful might happen.
Phq1: Little interest or pleasure in doing things.
Phq3: Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much.
Phq4: Feeling tired or having little energy.
Phq6: Feeling bad about yourself ‚Äî or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down.
Phq7: Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television.
Phq8: Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed. Or the opposite ‚Äî being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual.
Phq9: Thoughts that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself in some way.
Pss1: Unable to control the important things in your life.
Pss2: Confident in your ability to handle your personal problems.
Pss4: Confident in your ability to solve personal problems.
Pss5: Feeling that things are going your way.
Pss6: Unable to cope with all the things that you have to do.
Pss7: Able to control irritations in your life.
Pss8: Feeling that you are effectively managing the situation.
Pss9: Angry because of things that are outside of your control.
Pss10: Difficulties managing all the things you have to do.
Isi3: Waking up too early in the morning.
Isi4: Satisfaction with the quality of your sleep.
Isi5: How your sleep affects your daily activities.
Isi6: How noticeable your sleep problems are to others.
Isi7: Worry or distress about your sleep.
Meditation: While listening to music, you can practice your usual meditation. Or try autogenic training.
Followmusic: Make yourself comfortable and follow the music.
Inhalethroughyournose: Inhale through your nose and feel your belly fill with air. Slowly count to 3 while inhaling. Hold your breath for 1 second, then slowly exhale through your nose, counting to 3 again. Repeat 3 times.
Myhandsareheavy: Calmly and slowly repeat 6 times: 'My hands are very heavy and warm.' Then say to yourself: 'I am completely calm.'
Mylegsareheavy: Calmly and slowly repeat 6 times: 'My legs are very heavy and warm.' Then say to yourself: 'I am completely calm.'
Facialmusclesarerelaxed: Calmly and slowly repeat 6 times: 'My facial muscles are relaxed. My forehead is pleasantly cool.' Then say to yourself: 'I am completely calm.'
Yourfeedback: Your feedback will help improve the app!
Premium: Works only for Spotify Premium users. Subscribe to Premium:
menuDescription: The menu is indicated by three vertical dots. You can change language, report desired support direction, import instructions from your specialist using QR code, send session data to yourself or your specialist, view app information, and leave feedback.
dataPrivacyStatement: Important! All your information is stored only on your device! After 5 sessions, you can voluntarily pay for previous sessions and continue receiving support.
messageTooLongText: Your message exceeds the maximum size of {{maxTokens}} tokens. Please shorten it.
Spotifyopen: Continue the session with a specially curated playlist matching your mood.
Spotifypremium: Important! Spotify Premium account is required for emotional support effects.
Youcansend: You can send them to yourself.
welcomeText: Welcome! You will be chatting with an AI assistant for informational support, who is not a licensed professional and cannot replace professional help. You can change the language in the menu in the top right corner (three dots). All your data and chat content is stored only on your device! In the menu, you can also email yourself everything that's saved on your device. Now let's get acquainted.

systemMessages.forcedEndInstruction: Forced termination. Please summarize, say goodbye, and briefly recap the session.
systemMessages.costLimitMessage: Cost limit reached. Please summarize, say goodbye, and briefly recap the session.

diary.title: Diary entry
diary.encryptionErrorMessage: Encryption key is unavailable. Please try again later.
diary.saveFailedMessage: Failed to save encrypted entry to diary.
diary.reviewEmptyText: Your diary doesn't contain any entries yet.

dashboard.title: What would you like to do next?
dashboard.aiChat: Start a new session with the AI assistant?
dashboard.musicTherapy: Or maybe you want to listen to music?

Severe depression: 20-27: Signs of significant mood decline. Professional help is strongly recommended.
Moderately severe depression: 15-19: Signs of notable mood decline. Specialist consultation is recommended.
Moderate depression: 10-14: Signs of moderate mood decline. May be helpful to discuss with a doctor.
Mild depression: 5-9: Signs of mild mood decline. Monitor your condition.
Minimal depression: 0-4: Minimal signs of mood decline or none.

pss.low: 0-13: Your perceived stress level is low. You generally handle stressful situations well.
pss.moderate: 14-26: Your perceived stress level is moderate. You might want to consider stress management techniques.
pss.high: 27-40: Your perceived stress level is high. It may be helpful to seek professional help for stress management.

qr.invalidJsonOrContent: Invalid JSON or unacceptable content in QR code.
qr.clearConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete all saved QR data?
qr.scanInstructions: Point the camera at the QR code to scan.
qr.warningText: You are about to import data from a QR code. Make sure you trust the source of this code. You do this at your own risk. You can always clear this data.
qr.confirmCheckbox: I understand and accept the risks.

internalAppError: An internal application error occurred. Please restart the application.
aiChatDisclaimer: You are starting a conversation with an AI assistant for informational support. This is NOT a therapy session. If you need professional help, consult a licensed specialist.

payment.intro: It looks like your AI assistant chat sessions have ended.
payment.sessionsOverText: If you enjoyed the conversation, you can voluntarily pay for the past 5 sessions. This will give you access to a new package of 5 sessions to continue the dialogue.
payment.disclaimer: Purchase status is stored only on your device. Access may be lost when reinstalling the application.
payment.continueWithoutAi: Alternatively, you can continue using other app features without the AI assistant chat.

focusPrompt.title: üîç Set Focus
focusPrompt.subtitle: The AI assistant will focus on what's important to you right now. This can be anything ‚Äî dealing with a breakup, expecting a baby, planning a wedding, burnout, or personal goals.
focusPrompt.shortFocusPlaceholder: e.g., preparing for childbirth, weight loss, breakup, burnout, ...
focusPrompt.detailedFocusPlaceholder: Please tell a bit more detail about what's concerning you...
focusPrompt.clearConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete all saved focus data? This will reset the current topic for the AI assistant.
